posts.post_title: Wanted*-*miscuts, ghosts, upside down backs, printer scraps, oddities, newspaper ads
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Doug
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to purchase T206 cards that are miscuts, oddities, upside down backs, printer scraps, proofs, blank backs, ghost images, and newspaper ads featuring T206 in cigarettes (Old Mill, Hindu, Sweet Corporal, Piedmont). Please contact me if you know of anyone wanting to sell such items or if you may know where I can go to find such items aside from auctions (which I already scan through). Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

Doug

kilaartist@aol.com
